title: Health bar bug
body:
Since the new update, everytime i move my camera to a different ally when hes being attacked, for some reason instead of showing his current health, it shows him at full hp and then suddenly a massive damage to his health to his current health.
Is this happening to anyone else? This happens every time i move my camera to an area away from my champions field of vision.

replies.body: this is happening to me as well. Each time i look at someone it looks like they've just been one shot.
yes I am currently going through that as well... seems like towers have this bug too. its pretty frustrating and I hope someone knows how to fix it lol

That's really strange!  Can you guys try a config reset in-case a setting or modification is causing this visual error?

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps.  If not, post this over at the [bug report boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) so QA can take a look.
